CompanyDetail.ProjectName: An AI enabled Digital Procurement Platform
CompanyDetail.CompanyContent: Procurezen is a comprehensive AI-Enabled digital procurement platform, that covers the various processes relating to Supplier Onboarding, Procurement Forecasting, Sourcing Management including Quotations, Tenders, Proposals, Auctions and Reverse Auctions, , Contract Life Cycle Management,  Order Management, Milestone Completion Request & Approvals, Invoice & Payment Tracking, 360-degree Performance Evaluation, and comprehensive Insights including the multi-dimensional Spend Analytics.

RegisterCreation.RegSubTitle: procureZEN Solutions is an emerging technology initiative by DSSI Solutions and MITRAA LEGAL, focused on leveraging IoT, ICT, and Cybertech technologies
